# phare_uptime_incident (Data Source)

Retrieves information about a Phare uptime incident (status page incident).

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Read information about a specific incident
data "phare_uptime_incident" "example" {
  id = "incident-id-here"
}

# Output incident details
output "incident_status" {
  value = data.phare_uptime_incident.example.status
}

output "incident_duration" {
  value = data.phare_uptime_incident.example.duration
}

output "incident_started_at" {
  value = data.phare_uptime_incident.example.started_at
}

output "incident_resolved_at" {
  value = data.phare_uptime_incident.example.resolved_at
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the incident

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the incident was created
- `description` (String) The description of the incident
- `exclude_from_downtime` (Boolean) Whether this incident is excluded from downtime calculations
- `impact` (String) The impact level of the incident (e.g., majorOutage, degradedPerformance)
- `incident_at` (String) Timestamp when the incident occurred
- `project_id` (Number) The ID of the project this incident belongs to
- `recovery_at` (String) Timestamp when the incident was recovered (if resolved)
- `slug` (String) The URL-friendly slug for the incident
- `state` (String) The current state of the incident (e.g., investigating, identified, monitoring)
- `status` (String) Current status of the incident (ongoing or resolved)
- `title` (String) The title of the incident
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the incident was last updated
